instructions: Change the grey rectangle dimensions and color: `fill('#A6A6A6'); rect(0, 246, 174, 127);`

Remove the incorrectly positioned white stripe: `fill('#FFFFFF'); rect(0, 200, 174, 19);`  delete this line entirely. Add a new rectangle for the correctly positioned and sized stripe: `fill('#FFFFFF'); rect(0, 347, 174, 26);`
Change the right-hand white rectangle dimensions: `fill('#FFFFFF'); rect(174, 0, 87, 279);`
Change the red rectangle's position and dimensions based on the correction of the white rectangle: `fill('#FF0000'); rect(174, 279, 87, 19);`
Change the black rectangle's position and dimensions based on the correction of the white and red rectangles: `fill('#000000'); rect(174, 298, 87, 75);`
